articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Exercise improves colon cancer survival, high-quality trial finds - Ars Technica
articles.description: Any type of aerobic exercise works for the improvements, study finds.

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Samsung could drop Google Gemini in favor of Perplexity for Galaxy S26 - Ars Technica
articles.description: This move would reduce Samsung’s reliance on Google.

articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: How AI chatbots keep you chatting - TechCrunch
articles.description: As AI chatbots grow into large-scale businesses, companies may use engagement optimization techniques even at the expense of user well-being.
articles.content: Millions of people are now using ChatGPT as a therapist, career advisor, fitness coach, or sometimes just a friend to vent to. In 2025, it’s not uncommon to hear about people spilling intimate detail… [+5649 chars]
